titleStmt.title: A copy book, containing both experimental precepts and usual practices of fair and speedy writing with the necessaries thereunto belonging ... / by J. Johnson, Master of writing.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, J., Master of writing.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Brugis for Iohn Overton ...,

notesStmt.note: Added engraved t.p. with title: A new coppie booke of the vsuall hands of England. London : Printed and sould by P. Stent, 1669.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
